gov.nih.nci.cabig.caaers.domain.repository
Interface ReportValidationService

All Known Implementing Classes:
ReportValidationServiceImpl
public interface ReportValidationService

This is an service class, which is used to validate and check for report submitability.

Author:
Sameer Sawant Created-on : Nov 05, 2009

Method Summary
 ReportSubmittability isSubmittable(Report report)
          Will tell whether all the mandatory field for this report is duly filled.
 ReportSubmittability validate(Report report, java.util.Collection<ExpeditedReportSection> expeditedReportSections, java.util.Collection<ExpeditedReportSection> mandatorySections)
          Will tell whether all the mandatory field for this report is duly filled.
 

Method Detail

isSubmittable

ReportSubmittability isSubmittable(Report report)
Will tell whether all the mandatory field for this report is duly filled. This method will validate against all the sections defined in ExpeditedReportSection

Parameters:
report - the report
Returns:
ErrorMessages, if any.

validate

ReportSubmittability validate(Report report,
                              java.util.Collection<ExpeditedReportSection> expeditedReportSections,
                              java.util.Collection<ExpeditedReportSection> mandatorySections)
Will tell whether all the mandatory field for this report is duly filled.

Parameters:
report - the report
expeditedReportSections - the expedited report sections
mandatorySections - the mandatory sections
Returns:
ErrorMessages, if any.
